title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: Monitor your assets, find trading ideas, have conversation with others and place trades on charts. Discover opportunities in international markets and spot trading ideas, Multiple Payment Options ,Research on Products,Explore ResourcesWith crypto, the transaction cost is low to nothing at all— the fee for transferring money from a digital wallet to a bank account. transactions can be made at any time of the day or night & it has no limits to purchases and withdrawals.All crypto transaction is recorded in a public list called the blockchain, it makes it easy to trace the history of Bitcoins .Blockchain aims to cut out intermediaries, such as banks and online marketplaces, which means there are no payment processing fees.
